statements: SELECT * FROM UserPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM UserPosts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM UserPosts WHERE user_id = 8 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM UserPosts WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content, post_date FROM UserPosts WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPosts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM UserPosts WHERE post_id > 100 AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM UserPosts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 5 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM UserPosts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(post_date) AS latest_post_date, MIN(post_date) AS earliest_post_date FROM UserPosts;
SELECT * FROM user_posts;
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM user_posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM post_comments ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM post_comments GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT * FROM user_posts WHERE post_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM user_posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, count(*) as total_posts FROM user_posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 3;
SELECT post_id, comment_id, comment_content FROM user_posts JOIN post_comments ON user_posts.post_id = post_comments.post_id;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM user_posts WHERE post_content LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, content FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS comment_count FROM comments GROUP BY post_id HAVING comment_count > 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY like_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE comment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM comments WHERE comment_text LIKE '%amazing%';
SELECT post_date, user_id FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_id, content FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM likes WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT posts.post_id, posts.content, users.username FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.user_id WHERE posts.created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY posts.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT comments.comment_id, comments.content, users.email, posts.content FROM comments JOIN users ON comments.user_id = users.user_id JOIN posts ON comments.post_id = posts.post_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY comments.created_at ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT likes.user_id, posts.post_id, COUNT(like_id) AS likes_count FROM likes JOIN posts ON likes.post_id = posts.post_id GROUP BY likes.user_id, posts.post_id HAVING likes_count > 10 ORDER BY likes_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes.user_id FROM posts JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id WHERE posts.user_id = 2;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(like_id) FROM likes GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY COUNT(like_id) DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM feed WHERE item_type IN ('post', 'comment') AND created_at >= '2021-01-01';
